import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../component/Rating' import products from '../products' const ProductScreen = ({match}) => { const product = products.find((p) => p._id === match.params.id) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price:{product.price} Descriptions:{product.description} Price: {product.price} Status: {product.countInStock>0 ?'In Stock': ' Out Of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
